# nmahierarchies

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`nmahierarchies` is an R package for producing all credible treatment hierarchies from a network meta-analysis.

Please refer to the vignette for a package demonstration.

## Installation

### Development

To install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/caitlin-h-daly/nmahierarchies)
```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("caitlin-h-daly/nmahierarchies")
```

or including the vignette
```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("caitlin-h-daly/nmahierarchies", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```
